# Templates

Reusable skeletons make it easy to add consistent documentation. Copy the relevant template when starting a new concept note, lab, checklist, or roadmap.

Templates currently available:

- `concept.md`
- `lab.md`
- `checklist.md`
- `roadmap.md`

Extend this directory as new artefact types emerge. When you update a template, note the change in `docs/CHANGELOG.md`.
